public class Shift

Represents a shift worked by a worker.

Constructor Detail

Shift

public Shift(long workerID)
Parametric constructor. Creates a shift based on worker's ID and current system date and time.

Parameters:
workerID - unique ID of the worker
Method Detail

loadShift

public static Shift loadShift(long id,
                              long workerID,
                              java.util.Calendar start,
                              java.util.Calendar end,
                              java.util.Calendar lastBreakStart,
                              long totalBreakTime)
Static constructor used for constructing a Shift that has been previously saved to the database.

Parameters:
id - shift's unique ID
workerID - of the shift's worker
start - date and time shift's start
end - date and time shift's end
lastBreakStart - date and time of the last break's start
totalBreakTime - total time spent on break in milliseconds
Returns:
newly created shift.

public void setStart(java.util.Calendar start)
Sets date and time of shift's start. Provided that given parameter is null or sets date after the date and time of shift's end, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

setLastBreakStart

public void setLastBreakStart(java.util.Calendar lastBreakStart)
Sets start date and time of the last break during shift. Provided that given parameter is null and current shift has no pending shift, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

Parameters:
lastBreakStart - start date and time of the last break during shift
Throws:

getTotalBreakTime

public long getTotalBreakTime()
Returns total break time in milliseconds.

Returns:
total break time in milliseconds

setTotalBreakTime

public void setTotalBreakTime(long totalBreakTime)
Sets total break time in milliseconds. Provided that given attribute is less than zero, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

Parameters:
totalBreakTime - total break time in milliseconds

addBreakTime

public void addBreakTime(long time)
Adds given parameter to shift's total break time. Provided that given parameter is less or equal to zero IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

Parameters:
time - time in milliseconds to add to shift's total break time
